options.name: Guardian
options.description: Gain +1 Physical Mitigation and +1 Block while wearing Heavy Armor. You are proficient with shields.

options.name: Shield Expert
options.description: Gain +1 Block. You can use your shield to protect an adjacent ally, granting them a +1 bonus to AC.

options.name: Heavy Armor Master
options.description: Gain +1 Physical Mitigation while wearing Heavy Armor. You reduce the damage from physical attacks by an additional 2 points.

options.name: Protective Instincts
options.description: Gain +1 Block and +1 Resilience. You can use your reaction to redirect an attack targeting an adjacent ally to yourself.

options.name: Action : Defensive Stance
options.description: Enter a defensive stance until the start of your next turn. While in this stance, you gain +2 to all Mitigation values and advantage on saving throws against effects that would move you.

options.name: Reaction : Shield Block
options.description: When you or an adjacent ally would take damage from an attack, you can use your reaction to reduce that damage by 1d10 + your Block modifier.

options.name: Living Wall
options.description: Gain +1 Physical Mitigation and +1 Block. You cannot be moved against your will while wearing Heavy Armor, and you count as one size larger for the purpose of grappling and shoving.

options.name: Action : Shield Slam
options.description: Make a special attack with your shield. If it hits, the target takes 1d8 + your Strength modifier damage and must make a Strength save or be pushed 10 feet and knocked prone.

options.name: Indomitable Defense
options.description: Gain +1 to all Mitigation types while wearing Heavy Armor. Once per day, you can automatically succeed on a saving throw against an effect that would damage or incapacitate you.

options.name: Master Guardian
options.description: Gain +2 Physical Mitigation and +2 Block while wearing Heavy Armor. You can extend your damage reduction abilities to all allies within 10 feet. Once per combat, you can negate all damage from a single attack targeting you or an adjacent ally.
